alex-sexton.title: Episode 1.1
alex-sexton.description: In the inaugural episode of the podcast, I talk to Alex Sexton, my former podcast co-host, a product engineer at Stripe, and the name-er of many things, including Front-End Ops.

burak-yiğit-kaya.title: Episode 1.2
burak-yiğit-kaya.description: Burak, a front-end lead at Disqus, is a third-party JavaScript kindred spirit. In this episode, we talk about the challenges of 3PJS, the importance of the developer experience, and when to stop optimizing for performance.

daniel-espeset-seth-walker.title: Episode 1.3
daniel-espeset-seth-walker.guest: Daniel Espeset and Seth Walker, Etsy
daniel-espeset-seth-walker.description: Daniel and Seth are on the front-end infrastructure team at Etsy, an offshoot of the performance team.
